name: Orbital Rescue (Post Compo)
description:
Orbital Rescue

Bold astronauts are stuck in orbit, forever looping around different planets!

As a spacecraft commander, you must fly in orbit and rescue the stranded astronauts.

Avoid burning fuel  - let gravity do the work for you :)

This is a post-compo version from a prototype originally built for Ludum Dare 47, available at https://zebrainflames.itch.io/orbital-rescue )

-----

Controls:

- A / Left and D/Right to turn

- W or Space to thrust

-M  - mute or unmute audio

----

Recent updates

v0.1.5:

- A starfield background effect to give a sense of scale when zooming

- Sound effects work

- Parts of the game logic migrated to F#

- Build setup fixes

v0.1.4:

- Trajectory visualization (prototype)

- Improvements to camera zooming

- Upgraded Godot engine version used to v3.2.3
